title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3 and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the local HTTP API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as an LLM and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoint).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama for local embeddings + generation, Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside a buffer; supports streaming and slash commands.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive streams.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed requests/responses and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage options.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-platform Docker image (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama in a container.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP bindings and strongly-typed payloads for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-contributed Modelfile recipes for CodeLlama, Vicuna, SQLCoder, Zephyr, etc.

title: ollama-dagster
summary: Discussion and example code showing how to wrap Ollama as a Dagster asset for local LLM pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit official example: minimal chat UI that talks to Ollama’s OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and SSE streaming support.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.
